pr_title: BR-102 Revert skipIT changes to DDF

timeline.message: BR-102 Revert skipIT changes to DDF

timeline.bodyText: Can we put core tests in their own stage? I think this will help us view its stability and potentially replace the itests only stage in the future. @pklinef thoughts?
timeline.author: shaundmorris

replies.bodyText: That would be very helpful for the reasons you gave as long as it does not add too much overhead.
replies.author: pklinef

timeline.message: BR-102 Revert skipIT changes to DDF

timeline.bodyText: Do you know how long it is taking the core tests to run? If it is less than an hour I like setting the timeout to 1 hour to keep a standard of not making exceed an hour.
timeline.author: shaundmorris

replies.bodyText: Core tests run under 10-15 mins, I set timeout to one hour for ITests and Core tests
replies.author: TonyMorrison

timeline.message: BR-102 Revert skipIT changes to DDF
